review_data.title: Convenient place to stop for a beer whilst awaiting your train or tram
review_data.content: This bar is seasonal. It is located in the middle of Stadelhoferplatz right outside the Stadelhofen railway station and between the tram stops. When open it is always busy. Service is friendly enough and the refreshments reasonably priced despite the central location. A convenient place...More
